public MozillaAutomation()
Method Detail

blockingLoad

public static boolean blockingLoad(JBrowserComponent<?> component,
                                   String url)
Loads an url into a mozilla window, blocking until the load finishes or expires.

blockingLoad

public static boolean blockingLoad(JBrowserComponent<?> component,
                                   String url,
                                   String postData)
Loads an url into a mozilla window. Additionally, POST data can be specified in the format param1=val1¶m2=val2... The function waits while the URL is loading and returns only when loading is finished. Returns true if the load failed (page does not exist)

blockingLoadHTML

public static boolean blockingLoadHTML(JBrowserComponent<?> component,
                                       String content,
                                       String asUrl)
Loads html content into a mozilla window. Sets the given url as the origin of the content.

triggerLoadHTML

public static boolean triggerLoadHTML(JBrowserComponent<?> component,
                                      String content,
                                      String asUrl)
Triggers loading of web page with the give content. Set the given url as the origin of the content. Returns true if failed.

blockingBack

public static boolean blockingBack(JBrowserComponent<?> component)
Load previous page in session history. Method blocks until loading is completed.

blockingForward

public static boolean blockingForward(JBrowserComponent<?> component)
Load next page in session history. Method blocks until loading is completed.

blockingReload

public static boolean blockingReload(JBrowserComponent<?> component)
Reload current page. Method blocks until loading is completed.

getElementRects

public static Rectangle[] getElementRects(Element e)
Mozilla renders each element as a sequence of frames. (Do not confuse with the HTML element)

This function returns coordinates of the frames that render the given element.

Parameters:
e - element
Returns:
coordinates of element's frames

getElementFromPoint

public static Element getElementFromPoint(Document doc,
                                          int x,
                                          int y)
Returns element with the x,y coordinates from the given document or some of its sub-documents.

Parameters:
doc -
x - x coordinate
y - y coordinate
Returns:
element
